p: The aerial parts of T. leucocladum (stems and leaves) were collected from the Nablus region of Palestine in May 2017. The plant was identified by pharmacognosist Dr. Nidal Jaradat. The voucher specimen was deposited in the Herbal Products Laboratory at An-Najah National University with a specific code: Pharm-PCT-2411. The collected plant materials were washed several times with distilled water. Afterward, the aerial parts were dried in the shade at a stable normal humidity level and ordinary temperature.
